headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Bounces Off Lows as Government Shutdown Concerns Ease
summary: The S&P 500 jumped 2.1% on Friday, March 14, wrapping up a volatile week as government shutdown concerns eased.

headline: Stocks to Watch Recap: DocuSign, Nvidia, Rubrik, Tesla
summary: ↗️ DocuSign (DOCU): The e-signature company logged higher-than-expected quarterly profit and revenue, boosted by its new AI-enabled products. Shares climbed 15%, its biggest daily gain of the year. ↘️ Abbott Laboratories (ABT), Reckitt Benckiser (UK: RKT): A U.

headline: Crown Castle, SoundHoundAI, Docusign: Market Minute
summary: Brad Smith examines the top stories on Wall Street as part of today's Market Minute. Crown Castle (CCI) shares jump after selling its fiber business. SoundHoundAI (SOUN) stock pops after announcing it will participate in the Nvidia (NVDA) GTC conference. Docusign (DOCU) climbs on the company's strong outlook. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. Editor's note: This post was updated to reflect the correct capitalization of Docusign.

headline: Crown Castle Stock Climbs on Fiber-Segment Sale
summary: Crown Castle shares rose after it said it was selling part of its business to focus on its core towers segment.  Crown Castle said it plans to use the cash proceeds to repay existing debt and fund anticipated share repurchases.  The transaction puts Crown Castle in a more stable financial position, KeyBanc Capital Markets analysts said.
